HDG.OHF.content: difficulty of untangling context of tightly woven categories, & demonstrating it in intuition, disappears if (always anew) we “hold to the task of appropriating (aneignet) the corresponding position of looking (entsprechenden Blickstand) at it and holding out in (durchält) this looking […] i.e., staying clear of a certain sedimented customary approach” [guard against (auf der Hut ist) slipping back into it unawares (unversehens)—is Heidegger always this vigilant? is attention given to destruction or to Being?]
